TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_malebawa, title = malebawa, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/malebawa} }

S.FORM: malebawa sapuelac ngatu cacay anu masetul tu atekakay a tuud ku tangah nu misa sa, namasetulay a tangah amalebawa. izay malebawa saw? u kagak a sapuelac sakamusa, anu masetul, isasa' nu banges, amapela' ku siekuan( : ).izikuz sa, ilabu'ay a izang malusa' tuway. tina izang masaupu i capi nu mapela'ay a siekuan, sayadahay tu ku izang, sisa, malebawa tuway. anu masetul ku lima saca bilil, caay malebawa. izay ku tangah a cacay ku malebawa saw? kapeten ku tangah nu mita, caay kalecad tu bilil, atekak ku tangah nu mita, dawmi ku bilil nu mita. u lakelalan, usakasa isasa' nu banges, atekak ku wukak nu tangah. mazepit ku banges tu tangah a wukak. caay kakiptul ku banges ipabaw nu tangah, sisa, masaupuay a izang tatizengan tehekal kya banges. anu masetul tu pakamalan, patelaw saca bilil, dawmiay a kidu, kay izang makiwasak isasa' nu bangesm, matunatun tuway. ilabu'ay a izang nu tunatun atu lebawa, maalaen tu nu banges, hamawsa inayi' tuway. ngatu tusa anu malebawa, pacuededen, kalamkam mangaay tu. anu matunatun sa, paakutiay, kalamkam mangaay tu. pacuededen tusa a demiad, mangay tu. anu masetul malebawa, amana miluciluc. katuud ku tademaw pakuhica palucilucen kapah tu. mungangaw a kawaw kuyni. anu miluciluc tu lebawa, mangaleb mapela' ku siekuan( : ), mangaleb tabaki tu kya lebawa. anu pacueded sa, mahepec ku siekuan, adidi' tu ku lebawa. anu adidi' tu ku lebawa, paakutiay tu, kapah tu ku zazan nu izang. namakayniyan a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Wikipayek paybalucu'ay pulungamin a cudad malebawa nasulitan nay pabalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018 1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun.
